title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“[the tenor] brings the opera to its climax in his final suicide.” [From a review of Handel's Tamerlano in the July 1987 issue of Stereo Review. Submitted by David L. Miles, Charlevoix, Michigan.]
